body:
suggested by a. benedict balbuena via mailing list

When [CARDNAME] e.t.b. put [NumberOfTokens] x/x [CREATURE] tokens with [ABILITY] into play

When [CARDNAME] e.t.b. return target [PermanentType] you control to owner's hand
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: allow additional ETB abilities in card script
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on August 12, 2012 18:38:36_

suggested by a. benedict balbuena via mailing list

When [CARDNAME] e.t.b. put [NumberOfTokens] x/x [CREATURE] tokens with [ABILITY] into play

When [CARDNAME] e.t.b. return target [PermanentType] you control to owner's hand

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=273_
